item.title: OpenAI, Reliance partner to add AI search to JioHotstar
item.dc:creator: Jagmeet Singh
item.description: The rollout includes two-way integration that surfaces streaming links directly inside ChatGPT.

item.title: Co-founders behind Reface and Prisma join hands to improve on-device model inference with Mirai
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description: Mirai raised a $10 million seed to improve how AI models run on devices like smartphones and laptops.

item.title: These former Big Tech engineers are using AI to navigate Trump’s trade chaos
item.dc:creator: Sean O'Kane
item.description: Amari AI is making custom AI-powered software that helps customs brokers modernize and minimize constantly shifting trade policies.

item.title: For open-source programs, AI coding tools are a mixed blessing
item.dc:creator: Russell Brandom
item.description: AI coding tools have enabled a flood of bad code that threatens to overwhelm many projects. Building new features is easier but maintaining them is just as hard.

item.title: Altman and Amodei share a moment of awkwardness at India’s big AI summit
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description: When Prime Minister Narendra Modi prompted speakers at the event to join hands and raise them in a show of unity, all executives on stage obliged, except OpenAI's Sam Altman and Anthropic's Dario Amodei, who held their hands conspicuously apart.

item.title: Freeform raises $67M Series B to scale up laser AI manufacturing
item.dc:creator: Tim Fernholz
item.description: “I think we're the only quote-unquote manufacturing company out there that has H200 clusters in a data center on site."

item.title: This VC’s best advice for building a founding team
item.dc:creator: Maggie Nye
item.description: One of the most consequential decisions early-stage founders have to make is who they will bring on as their founding team. The first five to 10 employees will have a massive impact on the company culture, and the precedents set with them are difficult to change down the road. That’s why this season on Build […]

item.title: Reliance unveils $110B AI investment plan as India ramps up tech ambitions
item.dc:creator: Jagmeet Singh
item.description: Reliance has begun building multi-gigawatt AI data centers in Jamnagar, with more than 120 MW of capacity expected to come online in 2026.

item.title: OpenAI taps Tata for 100MW AI data center capacity in India, eyes 1GW
item.dc:creator: Jagmeet Singh
item.description: OpenAI also plans to expand its presence in India with new offices in Mumbai and Bengaluru later this year.

item.title: OpenAI deepens India push with Pine Labs fintech partnership
item.dc:creator: Jagmeet Singh
item.description: OpenAI moves beyond ChatGPT in India with a Pine Labs deal targeting enterprise payments and AI-driven commerce.

item.title: Etsy sells secondhand clothing marketplace Depop to eBay for $1.2B
item.dc:creator: Aisha Malik
item.description: The deal comes nearly five years after Etsy purchased Depop for $1.62 billion, at a time when secondhand clothing apps were gaining traction during the pandemic.

item.title: Hacking conference Def Con bans three people linked to Epstein
item.dc:creator: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai
item.description: The Def Con hacking conference banned hackers Pablos Holman and Vincenzo Iozzo, as well as former MIT Media Lab director Joichi Ito, from attending the annual conference after their reported connections with Jeffrey Epstein.

item.title: Is your startup’s check engine light on? Google Cloud’s VP explains what to do
item.dc:creator: Theresa Loconsolo
item.description: Startup founders are being pushed to move faster than ever, using AI while facing tighter funding, rising infrastructure costs, and more pressure to show real traction early. Cloud credits, access to GPUs, and foundation models have made it easier to get started, but those early infrastructure choices can have unforeseen consequences once startups move beyond […]

item.title: A startup called Germ becomes the first private messenger that launches directly from Bluesky’s app
item.dc:creator: Sarah Perez
item.description: Social network Bluesky now offers private messaging by integrating the startup Germ's E2E encrypted messenger natively in its app.

item.title: SeatGeek and Spotify team up to offer concert ticket sales inside the music platform
item.dc:creator: Lauren Forristal
item.description: This is a strategic win for SeatGeek. With direct placement in the Spotify app, SeatGeek is positioned to reach millions of active music fans as they discover upcoming events, increasing the chances of converting listeners into ticket buyers.

item.title: Amazon halts Blue Jay robotics project after less than 6 months
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Szkutak
item.description: Amazon said Blue Jay's core tech will be used for other robotics projects and the employees who worked on it were moved to other projects.

item.title: Mastodon, a decentralized alternative to X, plans to target creators with new features
item.dc:creator: Sarah Perez
item.description: Mastodon is looking to grow its open source, decentralized social network with new features aimed at creators.

item.title: Data breach at fintech giant Figure affects close to a million customers
item.dc:creator: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai
item.description: The Figure data breach allowed hackers to steal customer names, dates of birth, physical addresses, phone numbers, and email addresses.

item.title: World Labs lands $1B, with $200M from Autodesk, to bring world models into 3D workflows
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Bellan
item.description: The partnership will see the two companies exploring how World Labs’ models can work alongside Autodesk’s tools, and vice versa, starting with a focus on entertainment use cases.

item.title: Google debuts $499 Pixel 10a
item.dc:creator: Aisha Malik
item.description: The smartphone is available for preorder now with shipments starting March 5. It comes in Lavender, Berry, Fog, and Obsidian.
